Tunable.name: DEFAULT_OFF_LOT_TOLERANCE
Tunable.description: The tolerance for when a Sim is considered off the lot. If a Sim is off the lot but within this tolerance, he will be considered on the lot from autonomy's perspective. Note that this only effects autonomy, nothing else.

Tunable.name: DEFAULT_RADIUS_TO_CONSIDER_OFF_LOT_OBJECTS
Tunable.display: Default Radius To Consider Off Lot Objects
Tunable.description: The radius from the Sim that an off-lot object must be for a Sim to consider it. If the object is not on the active lot and outside of this radius, the Sim will ignore it.
